meta.content: Shawnee Public Schools - Important Information Links

(Updated April 1, 2020)
Below are links to further information about COVID-19. This list will be updated as new information becomes available. Information about how to talk to students about COVID-19 is included.
Oklahoma State Department of Education OSDE COVID-19 Mental Health Resources OSDE COVID-19 FAQ Updated March 31, 2020 Talking to Children About Coronavirus (COVID-19)...

div.em: Current conditions as of 29 Apr 12:15 pm CDT

div.div: Sunny, with a high near 72. North northwest wind 18 to 23 mph, with gusts as high as 31 mph.
Clear, with a low around 48. Northwest wind 5 to 13 mph.
Sunny, with a high near 78. Light and variable wind becoming west around 6 mph in the afternoon.
